seedGroups.name: Shattering
seedGroups.description: Shattering seeds can be tough to visually judge for ripeness. Use a *gentle* touch test to see if the seeds easily loosen.

species.description: Shattering. This white flower grows in rhizomatous colonies. Usually 5 petals, and. 3 â€“ 5 leaflets. Individual plants take years to flower; typical to see more leafy plants than flowering ones. Collect when green seeds are loose, by a *gentle* touch test. Sow fresh.
